name: John
summary: John recently received negative feedback on his research paper. He feels frustrated and disappointed, as he had put in a lot of effort.

name: Alice
summary: Alice is struggling with an important presentation at work. She feels anxious and full of self-doubt, fearing that she might fail.

name: Michael
summary: Michael has been working overtime for weeks without rest. He feels stressed and exhausted, unable to find time for himself.

name: Sarah
summary: Sarah recently moved to a new city where she knows no one. She feels lonely and sad, missing her old friends and family.

name: David
summary: David's colleague took credit for his idea during a meeting. He feels resentment and irritation at the unfairness of the situation.

name: Emma
summary: Emma made a mistake on a group project that cost her team a high grade. She feels guilt and shame, regretting her actions.

name: James
summary: James just found out that his best friend shared his secret. He feels angry and betrayed, questioning their friendship.

name: Olivia
summary: Olivia has been job hunting for months with no success. She feels hopeless and discouraged, wondering if she will ever find a good opportunity.

name: Daniel
summary: Daniel turned down a great opportunity because of fear. He now feels frustration and regret, thinking about what could have been.

name: Sophia
summary: Sophia trained hard for a competition but didn't place well. She feels disappointed and worried about her future prospects.
